etri.sdn.controller.module.linkdiscovery

Class NodePortTuple

  • java.lang.Object
    • etri.sdn.controller.module.linkdiscovery.NodePortTuple

  • public class NodePortTuple
extends java.lang.Object
    A NodePortTuple is similar to a SwitchPortTuple but it only stores IDs instead of references to the actual objects.
    Author:
    srini

      API to return a String value formed with NodeID and PortID The portID is a 16-bit field, so mask it as an integer to get full positive value
